p: The antimicrobial activity of hexane and EtOAc extract of the stem bark of M. barteri (Benth.) Dunn was evaluated by determining the minimum inhibitory concentration against bacterial and fungal strains where, the reported MIC value is 64–512 µg/mL ( Havyarimana et al., 2012). The isolates millaurine and milletonine were tested for the first time for its antimicrobial activity. Both of the extracts showed antimicrobial where, EtOAc extract showed a significant result.
